After numerous failed attempts to delay the workers, he finally finds a way to stop them by offering them food, however, fails to notice steam from a cracked pipe and lights the candle in his cart of food - even though the workers told him not to.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean tries to watch TV with Teddy, but as he tries to find the remote, lots of springs come out of his sofa, prompting him to buy a new sofa. Since he cannot afford a new sofa costing £300, Bean decides to have a yard sale. Eventually, he sells a stamp for £300 to a passerby and then buys the sofa. However, Bean soon realises that his TV remote is still inside the old sofa.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: In a dark and cobwebby corner of his attic, Mr. Bean finds a treasure map. The hunt is on! But tricky clues lead Bean up the chimney, round the bend, down the garden path, up the blinking wall and nearly all the way to Australia.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The hapless halfwit finds himself out on the street after his landlady orders him to leave, but fortunately a scarecrow and a pair of false teeth come to his rescue

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: An old photo album causes Bean to reminisce about his lovely summers at scout camp as a boy, and sets him planning a night under the stars with Teddy. Purchasing a tent becomes a tricky problem – but nothing will stop him having a good time, even if he has to get the garden shed over the roof of his house.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When his model aeroplane is blown out of the sky by that of a rival kid, Mr. Bean sets his sights on revenge. Next day, his newly constructed fighter plane, almost ready for take-off, sadly lacks a vital part – and the blinking model shop is shut! No matter. It’s chocks away with Teddy at the controls, fighting for airspace over London N10.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. Butnever one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect quiet spot. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol. Undeterred he manages to get a push, but for some reason the do-gooders dont want to push him all the way to the beach! Instead he uses wind power, piggy backs on a car transporter and 802harnesses up some horses to try and get to his destination.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is out shopping when it starts to rain. Taking refuge in a trendy coffee bar, Bean is fascinated both by the brewing machinery andthe amount of money people will pay for small cups of coffee! Scenting a fortune to be made, Bean opens up his own, strange, successful coffee bar ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wakes up on a freezing cold winters morning to discover that the boiler is broken and no sign of the repairman.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesnt. Its too expensive. Irma kidnaps Teddy and refuses to give him back unless Bean promises to take her to Paris. Caught between his inability to pay and his love of Teddy Bean doesnt know what to do! Until he spots a cat beauty competition in which first prize is a romantic break in Paris - if only he can catch Scrapper ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irma’s Mum at all costs. He persuades Mrs. Wicket to let him join her on a coach trip to a concert.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentine’s Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irma’s attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a ‘date’ to the Valentine’s Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-teller’s prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has forgotten hes supposed to be cooking dinner for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. He dashes to the supermarket to buy some groceries but why buy food when you can win an entire trolley full in an All You Can Eat Competition? But Mr Bean has some stiff competition - no one can eat one of Mr Magg’s pies quicker than Mr Maggs himself. Mr Bean has to think fast to win. But after all that eating will Bean still be in the mood to cook a romantic meal?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in need of a sturdy new bookcase and sets off to visit a furniture warehouse. He finds one that’s perfect but is outraged when he’s told he has to build the bookcase himself! Bean is unfamiliar with flat pack assembly and struggles to construct his new bookcase failing miserably when he discovers he’s one screw short. Mr Bean heads back to the shop only to find it’s closed!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to take Teddy on holiday to the seaside. But when he arrives at his hotel a spoilt little girl wants Teddy all for herself. And her protective dad only wants the best for his ‘princess’. An on-going tussle ensues between Mr Bean the little girl and her Dad resulting in a chase across the seaside town and onto the pier. No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their ‘relaxing’ holiday!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is left in peace when Mrs Wicket goes off on her holidays. This means Mr Bean has free access to her daily newspaper. But every time he goes down to collect it from the letterbox it disappears. Someone is taking it but who? Mr Bean is determined to nab the mysterious newspaper stealer and uses a range of ingenious homemade traps in his quest to catch the sneaky thief.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to find a nice quiet place to read his book so he sets off for the Library. But instead of reading he becomes distracted by some funny online videos he sees on the Librarys computer. Before he knows it Mr Bean is recording his own video which is uploaded for everyone to see. Things start to go crazy when people check out his funny video and his popularity takes off. But does Mr Bean enjoy being in the public eye and how long will his celebrity last?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput takes refuge in a fancy hotel. Specs and Skinny bluff their way past the doorman by acting like they come from the expensive side of the tracks. Spoiler: they don’t.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean breaks his favourite Royal mug he discovers theres only one place to buy a replacement: Buckingham Palace, home of the Queen of England. When one of Her Majestys corgis runs off with his teddy, Bean gives chase through secret tunnels… and gets lost.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When did Mr. Bean first meet his teddy bear? Did he really learn to drive his mini at the age of ten? Could he possibly have known his battle-axe of a landlady when she was a sweet and blushing bride? Bean takes us on a journey into the past, answering these questions and giving us an inkling as to what made him the man he is today.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself lumbered with an unwanted pet in the form of a four-legged ball of pink fur with piggy eyes and a penchant for earthworms. Encyclopedias leave him none the wiser as to the identity of the pesky creature but Bean can’t bring himself to just abandon it. The puzzle is eventually solved after a picnic in the park and a raid on the local pet shop.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean forgets the golden rule: never fall asleep in the bath when youve got a chicken in the oven. So what romantic meal can he quickly rustle-up for his luckless girlfriend, Irma Gobb? The cheese from the mousetrap? The flower from the vase? A meal is eventually provided by an uninvited guest.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The nasty tennis player is big and angry and wants his ball back. The one Mr. Bean managed to throw on the roof of a house across the road. Paralysed with vertigo sixty feet up on a windowsill, he is eventually brought to earth by the helpful intervention of a neighbour’s pet gerbil.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Eating too many sweets gives Bean a terrible toothache, and when all other attempts at curing it are exhausted, he reluctantly visits the dreaded dentist.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After (accidentally) rescuing a kitten from a tree Mr. Bean is set to have his picture in the newspaper! The photographer arrives with the grateful lady cat owner, the scene is set, smiles all round…but then disaster strikes when Bean is continually upstaged by… his hair.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: As Mr Bean settles down to watch his favourite TV programme he hears loud noises from next-door. He moves from house to garden but can’t escape the relentless cacophony of trumpets, electric drills, and screaming babies. Bean’s mind turns to thoughts of revenge….

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Envious of all the attention his landlady is receiving because of a broken leg, Mr. Bean decides to break his leg too. When he ends up in hospital under the care of the Matron from Hell he discovers there are some kinds of attention even he doesnt enjoy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declan’s success and increase the amount of money he’s raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. Butnever one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect quiet spot. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol. Undeterred he manages to get a push, but for some reason the do-gooders dont want to push him all the way to the beach! Instead he uses wind power, piggy backs on a car transporter and 802harnesses up some horses to try and get to his destination.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Its the start of a Fun Run. Mr. Bean lines-up beside his deadly enemy: the fat bloke who stole his parking space. Fun Run or no, nothing will stop Bean beating this man to the finishing post, even if he has to flag a cab.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean gets in a flap when a monster turns up in his cake-mix. The good news, though, is that the monster turns out to be a harmless baby bird. The bad news is that it grows into a huge stork and takes over his home. Bean attempts to return it to the wild, and finds teaching it to fly makes his arms ache.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When the frogspawn in Mr. Bean’s bath hatch out, it’s the last thing his landlady needs, especially when she’s invited the Mayor for tea. Hundreds of angry amphibians decide to invite themselves as well. Bean proves to be no expert at catching slippery green things that won’t stop hopping about all over the blinking place.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean meets an aristocratic old lady when he nearly runs over her lapdog with his mini. Hes thrilled to be invited for luncheon at her grand but strangely shabby mansion. Bean is determined to rise to the occasion. Hes so busy with matters of protocol he doesnt notice that the lady and her sinister butler arent quite what they seem...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: How does one choose tasteful wallpaper these days? After watching a royal documentary on TV, Mr. Bean decides to decorate his room in the style of Buckingham Palace. If the Queen’s new wallpaper is good enough for Her Royal Highness, then it’s going to be good enough for him. Meanwhile, his landlady, Mrs. Wicket, suffers from illusions of grandeur and crowns herself Queen of the street.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself in a race to grow a giant marrow with his next-door neighbour. There’s prize money at stake and a chance to get his photo in the papers. And so, as the competition gets tough, Bean’s gardening techniques become more ingenious, unconventional and desperate.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: He’s got her record, the poster and the T-shirt, so when Mr. Bean’s heart-throb, Roxy, is set to sing in concert at the London Palladium, he sets his sights on the only thing that will make his life complete: her signature in his autograph book. A difficult feat but can love prevail?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is over the moon when he meets Mr. Pod because both men have so much in common; same shirt, jacket, trousers and underpants. And to top it all, Pod is Bean’s spitting image! Bean falls to Earth with a bump, though, when his girlfriend, Irma Gobb, finds Mr. Pod much better looking than him.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irma’s birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. There’s no time to lose as Mr Bean promises he’ll get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Bean’s phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Bean’s house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But it’s not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: While Mr. Bean is taking photos of wildlife, he sees big footprints belonging to a dinosaur. He starts running away but then gets an idea to take a photo of these footprints, hoping hell become famous. However, the dinosaur turns out to be part of a set for a movie called Jurassic Hero and Bean is added to the cast.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wicket’s beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesn’t stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean’s car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When one of the toy cars of his racing track set becomes broken, Mr. Bean decides to buy a new one but since his Mini has a flat tire, he decides to take a taxi. The taxi driver deliberately drives around the town and stops for gas and lunch in the hopes of getting a higher fare. Bean tries to escape, but other passengers mistake Bean as the driver, and Bean reluctantly drives the taxi.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Bean’s plan seems to be working – until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irma’s admiration be punctured?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. But it’s not long before the seagull in the flat turns out to be a cuckoo in the nest taking over Bean’s home – eating all his food controlling the TV and sleeping in his bed. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean breaks his favourite Royal mug he discovers theres only one place to buy a replacement: Buckingham Palace, home of the Queen of England. When one of Her Majestys corgis runs off with his teddy, Bean gives chase through secret tunnels… and gets lost.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When did Mr. Bean first meet his teddy bear? Did he really learn to drive his mini at the age of ten? Could he possibly have known his battle-axe of a landlady when she was a sweet and blushing bride? Bean takes us on a journey into the past, answering these questions and giving us an inkling as to what made him the man he is today.

programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself lumbered with an unwanted pet in the form of a four-legged ball of pink fur with piggy eyes and a penchant for earthworms. Encyclopedias leave him none the wiser as to the identity of the pesky creature but Bean can’t bring himself to just abandon it. The puzzle is eventually solved after a picnic in the park and a raid on the local pet shop.

So what romantic meal can he quickly rustle-up for his luckless girlfriend, Irma Gobb? The cheese from the mousetrap? The flower from the vase? A meal is eventually provided by an uninvited guest.

Paralysed with vertigo sixty feet up on a windowsill, he is eventually brought to earth by the helpful intervention of a neighbour’s pet gerbil.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Eating too many sweets gives Bean a terrible toothache, and when all other attempts at curing it are exhausted, he reluctantly visits the dreaded dentist.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After (accidentally) rescuing a kitten from a tree Mr. Bean is set to have his picture in the newspaper! The photographer arrives with the grateful lady cat owner, the scene is set, smiles all round…but then disaster strikes when Bean is continually upstaged by… his hair.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: As Mr Bean settles down to watch his favourite TV programme he hears loud noises from next-door. He moves from house to garden but can’t escape the relentless cacophony of trumpets, electric drills, and screaming babies. Bean’s mind turns to thoughts of revenge….

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Envious of all the attention his landlady is receiving because of a broken leg, Mr. Bean decides to break his leg too. When he ends up in hospital under the care of the Matron from Hell he discovers there are some kinds of attention even he doesnt enjoy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and won’t come back down. Irma loves this new side of Bean-ey! The tree surgeon is frustrated and tries various ploys to get Bean down. But can Bean make it to the toilet without being discovered and still save that tree?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught -where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem. Bean decides to hi-jack the sales process in order to deter all potential buyers -even if it means turning the whole house upside down!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile, Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. He could do wicked ollies with that! He absconds with a souped-up scooter and heads straight to the skate park, ready to challenge Bruiser Senior and Junior ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing -calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! He decides that the only way to restore peace in the household is to go out and find Scrapper himself -a journey that takes him deep into Londons sewers ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wicket’s nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean thinks he’s just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden and goes rushing off to the Museum to have it valued.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Declan giving Irma a lift in his swanky new SUV. Bean is unimpressed until Declan shows off all the cars features. Undeterred, Bean professes his car superior. Declan issues a challenge -to see which car Irma will choose for her lift back to work. Bean decides his car may need a little pimping ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Boundcourse. She refuses to go, but then ropes in Bean to look after the child. The two start a competition to see who will win the trophy. Bean is a relentless competitor, winning everything up until the point things start getting out of hand ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy have no plans, so decide to stay in bed all day. Mr Bean is determined that his feet can’t touch the ground, so he pushes the bed around with a broom. He has to find ingenious ways to make his tea and toast for breakfast, brush his teeth and an even bigger challenge of ordering a pizza and collecting it from downstairs without getting out of bed!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Whilst browsing the supermarket for lovely grub, Mr. Bean’s life-long pal, Teddy, is kidnapped. Bean tracks down the nasty men responsible and finds that Teddy is not their only captive. Mr. Bean rescues a hundred teddy bears once their ears are put through an industrial sewing machine.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean drives his favourite Teddy to the cinema to see his favourite movie - Titanic. Now he simply has to park the car. But when youre Mr Bean, nothings simple. His ingenious efforts to find a parking space are persistently foiled. And the clock is ticking....

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A local archaeology dig inspires Bean to go in search of treasure. But why buy a metal detector when you can make one from lawnmower parts and a dustbin lid? After destroying his landlady’s back garden, Mr. Bean tries out his hand-made contraption in the woods. He is overjoyed to discover a buried chest of gold doubloons. However, his happiness is soon thwarted by the arrival of two baddies, the police and a very angry Landlady.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: There’s easy money to be had in the art world and Mr. Bean is set on getting some of it. Once equipped with the right tools, he ventures into the countryside with a blank canvas in search of inspiration – and comes home with a painting full of life. Literally.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean finds a fly in his room, its war. He needs weapons. Fly spray? A rolled-up magazine? These are only the start. In desperation, he enlists a mouldy doughnut, an encyclopaedia, an upside-down dustbin and a club-hammer. Finally, Bean becomes the first man in history to wage war on a fly... with a fridge.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A leisurely stroll in the park turns into a run when Mr. Bean is chased home by an angry Mime Artist. He is lost for more words than usual when the street performer makes himself at home and insists on being wined and dined. Bean ousts the pest from his house using the only language mime artists understand.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Chaotic cartoon capers following the further adventures of the popular halfwit immortalised in the live-action TV series and Hollywood films. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Sometimes Mr. Bean’s Teddy can be no fun at all. Feeling the need for a new friend, Bean buys a parrot. But getting the parrot past his landlady and her one-eyed cat, Scrapper, proves to be no easy task. Next, is trying to get the blasted bird to speak.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irma’s birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. There’s no time to lose as Mr Bean promises he’ll get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Bean’s phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Bean’s house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But it’s not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: While Mr. Bean is taking photos of wildlife, he sees big footprints belonging to a dinosaur. He starts running away but then gets an idea to take a photo of these footprints, hoping hell become famous. However, the dinosaur turns out to be part of a set for a movie called Jurassic Hero and Bean is added to the cast.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wicket’s beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesn’t stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean’s car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When one of the toy cars of his racing track set becomes broken, Mr. Bean decides to buy a new one but since his Mini has a flat tire, he decides to take a taxi. The taxi driver deliberately drives around the town and stops for gas and lunch in the hopes of getting a higher fare. Bean tries to escape, but other passengers mistake Bean as the driver, and Bean reluctantly drives the taxi.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Bean’s plan seems to be working – until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irma’s admiration be punctured?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. But it’s not long before the seagull in the flat turns out to be a cuckoo in the nest taking over Bean’s home – eating all his food controlling the TV and sleeping in his bed. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean breaks his favourite Royal mug he discovers theres only one place to buy a replacement: Buckingham Palace, home of the Queen of England. When one of Her Majestys corgis runs off with his teddy, Bean gives chase through secret tunnels… and gets lost.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When did Mr. Bean first meet his teddy bear? Did he really learn to drive his mini at the age of ten? Could he possibly have known his battle-axe of a landlady when she was a sweet and blushing bride? Bean takes us on a journey into the past, answering these questions and giving us an inkling as to what made him the man he is today.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself lumbered with an unwanted pet in the form of a four-legged ball of pink fur with piggy eyes and a penchant for earthworms. Encyclopedias leave him none the wiser as to the identity of the pesky creature but Bean can’t bring himself to just abandon it. The puzzle is eventually solved after a picnic in the park and a raid on the local pet shop.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean forgets the golden rule: never fall asleep in the bath when youve got a chicken in the oven. So what romantic meal can he quickly rustle-up for his luckless girlfriend, Irma Gobb? The cheese from the mousetrap? The flower from the vase? A meal is eventually provided by an uninvited guest.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The nasty tennis player is big and angry and wants his ball back. The one Mr. Bean managed to throw on the roof of a house across the road. Paralysed with vertigo sixty feet up on a windowsill, he is eventually brought to earth by the helpful intervention of a neighbour’s pet gerbil.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Eating too many sweets gives Bean a terrible toothache, and when all other attempts at curing it are exhausted, he reluctantly visits the dreaded dentist.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After (accidentally) rescuing a kitten from a tree Mr. Bean is set to have his picture in the newspaper! The photographer arrives with the grateful lady cat owner, the scene is set, smiles all round…but then disaster strikes when Bean is continually upstaged by… his hair.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: As Mr Bean settles down to watch his favourite TV programme he hears loud noises from next-door. He moves from house to garden but can’t escape the relentless cacophony of trumpets, electric drills, and screaming babies. Bean’s mind turns to thoughts of revenge….

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Envious of all the attention his landlady is receiving because of a broken leg, Mr. Bean decides to break his leg too. When he ends up in hospital under the care of the Matron from Hell he discovers there are some kinds of attention even he doesnt enjoy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesn’t have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he can’t remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine there’s only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Bean’s main concern is to get some money and get back to the baker’s before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own ‘No Littering’ signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentine’s Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irma’s attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a ‘date’ to the Valentine’s Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-teller’s prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has forgotten hes supposed to be cooking dinner for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. He dashes to the supermarket to buy some groceries but why buy food when you can win an entire trolley full in an All You Can Eat Competition? But Mr Bean has some stiff competition - no one can eat one of Mr Magg’s pies quicker than Mr Maggs himself. Mr Bean has to think fast to win. But after all that eating will Bean still be in the mood to cook a romantic meal?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in need of a sturdy new bookcase and sets off to visit a furniture warehouse. He finds one that’s perfect but is outraged when he’s told he has to build the bookcase himself! Bean is unfamiliar with flat pack assembly and struggles to construct his new bookcase failing miserably when he discovers he’s one screw short. Mr Bean heads back to the shop only to find it’s closed!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to take Teddy on holiday to the seaside. But when he arrives at his hotel a spoilt little girl wants Teddy all for herself. And her protective dad only wants the best for his ‘princess’. An on-going tussle ensues between Mr Bean the little girl and her Dad resulting in a chase across the seaside town and onto the pier. No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their ‘relaxing’ holiday!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is left in peace when Mrs Wicket goes off on her holidays. This means Mr Bean has free access to her daily newspaper. But every time he goes down to collect it from the letterbox it disappears. Someone is taking it but who? Mr Bean is determined to nab the mysterious newspaper stealer and uses a range of ingenious homemade traps in his quest to catch the sneaky thief.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to find a nice quiet place to read his book so he sets off for the Library. But instead of reading he becomes distracted by some funny online videos he sees on the Librarys computer. Before he knows it Mr Bean is recording his own video which is uploaded for everyone to see. Things start to go crazy when people check out his funny video and his popularity takes off. But does Mr Bean enjoy being in the public eye and how long will his celebrity last?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is obsessed by his favourite TV hero ‘Super Spy’ and is excited when his very own Super-Spy spy kit arrives in the post. While Mr Bean is pretending to be his favourite character and delighting in all his gadgets he spots some unusual goings on in the Bruisers’ house next door. Naturally Mr Bean assumes the worst and sets out to rectify the situation.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Its the start of a Fun Run. Mr. Bean lines-up beside his deadly enemy: the fat bloke who stole his parking space. Fun Run or no, nothing will stop Bean beating this man to the finishing post, even if he has to flag a cab.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean gets in a flap when a monster turns up in his cake-mix. The good news, though, is that the monster turns out to be a harmless baby bird. The bad news is that it grows into a huge stork and takes over his home. Bean attempts to return it to the wild, and finds teaching it to fly makes his arms ache.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When the frogspawn in Mr. Bean’s bath hatch out, it’s the last thing his landlady needs, especially when she’s invited the Mayor for tea. Hundreds of angry amphibians decide to invite themselves as well. Bean proves to be no expert at catching slippery green things that won’t stop hopping about all over the blinking place.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean meets an aristocratic old lady when he nearly runs over her lapdog with his mini. Hes thrilled to be invited for luncheon at her grand but strangely shabby mansion. Bean is determined to rise to the occasion. Hes so busy with matters of protocol he doesnt notice that the lady and her sinister butler arent quite what they seem...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: How does one choose tasteful wallpaper these days? After watching a royal documentary on TV, Mr. Bean decides to decorate his room in the style of Buckingham Palace. If the Queen’s new wallpaper is good enough for Her Royal Highness, then it’s going to be good enough for him. Meanwhile, his landlady, Mrs. Wicket, suffers from illusions of grandeur and crowns herself Queen of the street.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself in a race to grow a giant marrow with his next-door neighbour. There’s prize money at stake and a chance to get his photo in the papers. And so, as the competition gets tough, Bean’s gardening techniques become more ingenious, unconventional and desperate.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: He’s got her record, the poster and the T-shirt, so when Mr. Bean’s heart-throb, Roxy, is set to sing in concert at the London Palladium, he sets his sights on the only thing that will make his life complete: her signature in his autograph book. A difficult feat but can love prevail?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is over the moon when he meets Mr. Pod because both men have so much in common; same shirt, jacket, trousers and underpants. And to top it all, Pod is Bean’s spitting image! Bean falls to Earth with a bump, though, when his girlfriend, Irma Gobb, finds Mr. Pod much better looking than him.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irma’s birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. There’s no time to lose as Mr Bean promises he’ll get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Bean’s phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.desc: As Mr Bean settles down to watch his favourite TV programme he hears loud noises from next-door. He moves from house to garden but can’t escape the relentless cacophony of trumpets, electric drills, and screaming babies. Bean’s mind turns to thoughts of revenge….

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Envious of all the attention his landlady is receiving because of a broken leg, Mr. Bean decides to break his leg too. When he ends up in hospital under the care of the Matron from Hell he discovers there are some kinds of attention even he doesnt enjoy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and won’t come back down. Irma loves this new side of Bean-ey! The tree surgeon is frustrated and tries various ploys to get Bean down. But can Bean make it to the toilet without being discovered and still save that tree?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught -where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem. Bean decides to hi-jack the sales process in order to deter all potential buyers -even if it means turning the whole house upside down!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile, Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. He could do wicked ollies with that! He absconds with a souped-up scooter and heads straight to the skate park, ready to challenge Bruiser Senior and Junior ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing -calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! He decides that the only way to restore peace in the household is to go out and find Scrapper himself -a journey that takes him deep into Londons sewers ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wicket’s nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean thinks he’s just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden and goes rushing off to the Museum to have it valued.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Declan giving Irma a lift in his swanky new SUV. Bean is unimpressed until Declan shows off all the cars features. Undeterred, Bean professes his car superior. Declan issues a challenge -to see which car Irma will choose for her lift back to work. Bean decides his car may need a little pimping ...

programme.desc: How do they hand-roll New York bagels? How do they make a racing car tyre to grip the track at 320 km an hour? And, how do they make lifelike sculptures out of glass?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: How do they collect the trash in road-free Venice? How do they make Australias famous sheepskin boots? And, how do they turn pond algae into a health supplement?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: Examining how rosebuds are turned into Turkish delight, and how sunscreen is made to block out harmful UV light. Plus, how to hammer out a silver spoon.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: How do they create the worlds finest canvases? How do they cook up foul-smelling stinky tofu? And, how do they get fifty drinks out of a single bottle of beer?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: How do they look after bees to make millions of jars of honey? How do they build a trike to carry the whole family, and how to stop a bullet with a sheet of ceramic?

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: A team of specialists, armed with the latest technology, try to locate the fabled bigfoot. The start of their search takes them to the forests of Oregon.

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: With a team member down, Russell and Mireya must forge ahead to hunt down leads. Their investigations uncover the first pieces of potential Bigfoot evidence.

programme.title: Unexplained And Unexplored
programme.desc: Justin and Emiliano journey from California to Mexico, battling treacherous conditions, to find ancient carvings and treasure maps that ultimately lead them to the brink of making one of their biggest archaeological finds.

programme.title: Unexplained And Unexplored
programme.desc: Using clues found in old prospectors maps, Justin and Emiliano brave the heat in search of the Lost Dutchmans Gold Mine in Arizona, uncovering never-before-seen artifacts, and maybe finally solving the puzzle of what happened.

programme.title: NASAs Unexplained Files
programme.desc: An Apollo 17 photo seems to show a US military outpost on the Moon and is life in the oceans of Jupiters moons? Plus Neil Armstrong faces real danger.

programme.title: NASAs Unexplained Files
programme.desc: When a Chinese moon rover breaks down, a NASA scientist points to a mysterious material that seemed to sabotage the Apollo missions, decades earlier. The Rosetta spacecraft finds a comet that appears to be singing.

programme.title: NASAs Unexplained Files
programme.desc: Newly discovered documents reveal NASAs secret plan B for failure of the first moon landing. And NASAs Cassini mission unravels a 300-year-old mystery.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Candace on vastuussa veljistaan silla aikaa kun vanhemmat ovat lomalla. Kun han kuulee, etta pojat aikovat matkustaa maailman ympari ja nauttia kesan pisimmasta paivasta, han lahtee harkitsematta heidan mukaansa. Bufordin, Baljeetin ja Isabellan kanssa kolmikko suuntaa Japaniin ja Ranskaan, jossa he oppivat uskomaan mahdottomiinkin asioihin. Buford lyo vetoa, etteivat Finias ja Ferb onnistu luomaan historian pisinta kesapaivaa… vaikka han salaa pitaakin heille peukkuja. Tohtori Tollontyo kidnappaa majuri Sahkeisen, jonka oli tarkoitus luennoida Hyvisten konferenssissa. Tollontyon tytar Vanessa ei ensin ilahdu siita, etta isa ottaa tyoasioita mukaan lomalle, mutta lopuksi tytto huomaa, etta hanenkin sisallaan asuu pieni pahis.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. Perheen lemmikki, Nokkaelain Perry, elaa kaksoiselamaa salaisena agenttina ja on joka jaksossa napit vastakkain ilkean Tohtori Tollontyon kanssa.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Phineas ja Ferb asuvat Luke Skywalkeria lahella olevilla kasteviljelmilla Tatooinen planeetalla, kun R2-D2 ja Kuolemantahden suunnitelmat putoavat vahingossa heidan kiituriinsa. Galaksin kohtalo on heidan harteillaan, joten he palkkaavat Han Solon kilpailijan, Isabellan, jotta saavat suunnitelmat palautettua kapinallisille. Matkaan tulee mutka, kun matala-arvoinen iskujoukkojen sotilas, Candace, paattaa yrittaa estaa kapinallisten toimet ja paatyy jahtaamaan heita ympari galaksin saadakseen Kuolemantahden suunnitelmat takaisin. Samaan aikaan Kuolemantahdella kehittyy intergalaktisen tason kaaosta. Perry the Rebelpus yrittaa estaa Darthenshmirtzia kayttamasta uutta Sith-inator-asetta, mutta hanet jaadytetaan karboniittiin. Soppa pahenee, kun Ferb saa iskun Sith-inatorista, joka muuttaa hanet Sithiksi, ja hanen on taisteltava veljiaan vastaan.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Candace on murtanut nilkkansa ja on toipilaana kun Finias ja Ferb rakentavat stratosfaarin ionisoijaa. Koska Candace haluaa silti paasta karayttamaan veljensaa, han joutuu keksimaan luovia keinoja saadakseen aidin huomion. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo valmistautuu hyokkaamaan Kanakeittonaattorillaan ja Perryn taytyy pysayttaa hanet. / Flynn-Fletcherit ovat palaamassa kotiin autoretkelta ja Finias ja Ferb paattavat rakentaa perinteisen amerikkalaisen tienvarsikahvilan retkiauton katolle. Silla valin Perryn taytyy estaa tohtori Tollontyota kuljettamasta rajahdysherkkaa nestetta kaupunkiin.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Candace innostuu kun pojat rakentavat jattiversion hanen lempilautapelistaan muuttamalla koko kaupungin Voropoli-pelilaudaksi. Silla valin Vanessa on telttaretkella ystaviensa kanssa ja tohtori Tollontyo pyytaa Perryn apua tyttarensa suojelemiseksi. / Kun Baljeet kertoo Finiakselle ja Ferbille sukunsa epaonnisesta polkupyorakilpailuhistoriasta, pojat rakentavat oman pyoraratansa, jotta han saisi voittaa. Silla valin Candace aikoo hankkia todisteita poikien puuhista uuden videokameransa avulla, mutta Tollontyon Ponnahdusnaattorin mainokset uhkaavat pilata hanen suunnitelmansa.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb rakentavat biosfaarin, jossa Isabella ja muuta partiotytot voivat hankkia ansiomerkkeja. Silla valin Candace pohtii, miksi Jeremy tykkaa hanesta ja tri Tollontyo ottaa kayttoon Sadenaattorinsa. / Candace lupaa Stacylle viettaa paivan taman kanssa ilman Jeremya, mutta yllattaen Jeremy tarttuu kiinni hanen kylkeensa. Han syyttaa veljiaan ja yrittaa saada nama irrottamaan Jeremyn samalla kun han itse yrittaa piilotella tata Stacylta. Samaan aikaan Isabella tahtoisi paasta viettamaan aikaa kahdestaan Finiaksen kanssa, mutta tama jahtaa ystavineen jattilaisrobottikoiraa ympari kaupunkia.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb rakentavat valtavan terashain Danvillen vuosittaisia Satamapaivia varten, mutta Candace on jalleen paattanyt karayttaa heidat. Stacyn ja kapteeni Tihrun avustamana Candace lahtee metsastamaan haita ja veljiaan. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo onnistuu sotkemaan itsensa Suolavesitoffeennaattoriinsa. / Finias ja Ferb saavat selville, etta Kuun heikompi painovoima tekee jaatelosta erityisen hyvaa, joten he lastaavat raketin tayteen lehmia ja lentavat Kuuhun testaamaan teoriaa. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo hyokkaa naapurinsa parvekekasvien kimppuun Kosteusimunaattorillaan ja Stacy auttaa Candacea kokkaamaan Jeremylle romanttisen aterian.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. Perheen lemmikki, Nokkaelain Perry, elaa kaksoiselamaa salaisena agenttina ja on joka jaksossa napit vastakkain ilkean Tohtori Tollontyon kanssa.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Pojat ovat ylpeita Perrysta, kun siita tehdaan Tyokalutuvan mainoskampanjan keulahahmo. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo uhkaa kaupunkia Viiksinaattorillaan ja Candace osallistuu seminaariin paastakseen eroon karayttamispakkomielteestaan, mutta lahtee loppujen lopuksi veljiensa peraan entista paattavaisempana. / Kun pojat heittavat tikkaa jattitikalla, aiti puuhastelee nykytaideprojektin kanssa – mutta Candace erehtyy luulemaan aidin jateveistosta poikien uusimmaksi keksinnoksi. Silla valin isa osallistuu vahingossa pahojen tiedemiesten jarjeston johtajakilpaan.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Kun Candace hukkaa kannykkansa ja rikkoo sitten aidilta saamansa uuden kannykan, han pelkaa joutuvansa pulaan. Mutta Finias ja Ferb korjaavat puhelimen ja lisaavat siihen runsaasti uusia toimintoja. Candace on tyytyvainen – kunnes puhelin telesiirtaa hanet Paasiaissaarille! Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo kehittaa Noutonaattorin. / Isa katselee lapsuutensa lempisarjaa, mutta television taikamattoajelu ei veda vertoja ajan kultaamille muistoille. Siispa Finias ja Ferb paattavat tehda hanelle oikean lentavan maton. Silla valin Candace yrittaa ennustaa tulevaisuutta onnenkeksien avulla ja tohtori Tollontyo on varastanut hankalasti puhdistettavia aineita Tahranaattoriaan varten.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Kun Candace pilaa kampauksensa juuri ennen Jeremyn aidin jarjestamaa hyvantekevaisyysgaalaa, han joutuu turvautumaan Finiaksen ja Ferbin apuun. Han ei kuitenkaan noudata poikien ohjeita ja on pian kokonaan karvan peitossa. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo on rakentanut Tosi-Pahanaattorin ja odottaa innolla, etta paasee nakemaan, mita se tekee. / On Danvillen vuosittaisten lihamurekefestivaalien aika ja aiti paasee toimimaan mureketuomarina. Kun Buford rikkoo festivaalien pomppulinnan, Finias ja Ferb rakentavat jattilaislinnan sen tilalle. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo, joka on paattanyt voittaa murekekilpailun, kayttaa Madattajanaattoria pilatakseen muiden kilpailijoiden murekkeet.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Kun aiti tarjoutuu viettamaan koko paivan Candacen kanssa, tama on varma, etta paasee viimein karayttamaan veljensa – mutta he eivat teekaan mitaan mielenkiintoista! Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo menettaa muistinsa uusimman naattorinsa takia ja Norm kayttaa tilaisuutta hyvakseen teeskennellakseen hanen poikaansa.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. Perheen lemmikki, Nokkaelain Perry, elaa kaksoiselamaa salaisena agenttina ja on joka jaksossa napit vastakkain ilkean Tohtori Tollontyon kanssa.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Gepardin vauhti inspiroi Finiasia ja Ferbia valmistamaan huippunopeat kengat. Candacea eivat poikien puuhat kiinnosta, silla han valmistautuu Jeremyn perheen retkipaivaan. Pian han huomaa luvanneensa liikoja yhdelle paivalle ja astuu viallisiin prototyyppikenkiin ehtiakseen ajoissa kaikkialle. Tollontyolla on rahahuolia, ja han murehtii, joutuuko hanen talonsa myyntiin. / Finias ja Ferb ovat isovanhempien luona kylassa yhdessa ystaviensa kanssa. Lasten kisaillessa kuumailmapalloillaan Candace paattaa ottaa rennosti ja luopuu tavoitteestaan nalkittaa pojat. Myohemmin han oppii olemaan sisukkaampi. Tohtori Tollontyo rakentaa dronttinaattorin ja uhkaa paastaa valloilleen pelottavan dronttilintuarmeijansa.

programme.desc: Celia Hansonil, maale kolinud vanal õpetajal, tekib tuli farmerist naabriga. Blaketoni sekkumine ajab asja kriminaalseks.

programme.title: Eesti nuud siis Vabariik
programme.desc: Kukekese baar saab uue ja erutava masina, mis võtab Illaril kaed varisema. Ats puuab Marjut toetada. Kõik kardavad Helle Vokki, kuid Helle loodab hoopis silmailu saada. Poolikust pildist saab elu ja surma kusimus.

programme.title: Tuleb tuttav ette
programme.desc: 1980. aasta oli uks vaga põnev aeg. Tallinnas korraldati olumpiamangude raames rahvusvaheline purjeregatt ning valismaist ja uut tulvas uksest ning akendest. Sama aasta martsikuus nagi ilmavalgust 3. osa meelelahutussarjast "Miks ka mitte?", kus esines kullakarvaline, toonases ilmapildis uudsena mõjuv ja juba populaarsust koguv trio. Saatejuht Reet Linna, režissoor Maire Radsin.

programme.title: Terevisioon
programme.desc: „Terevisioonis" on koos uudised, ilmateade, olulised jutuajamised ja mõnusad kulalised. Saravad saatejuhid Katrin Viirpalu, Martha-Beryl Grauberg, Juhan Kilumets ja Reimo Sildvee annavad endast parima, et kõik teie paevad algaksid energiliselt ning hasti. Režissoorid Elo Selirand ja Johanna Maria Vilgats, produtsent Rait Roland Veskemaa

programme.title: Terevisioon
programme.desc: „Terevisioonis" on koos uudised, ilmateade, olulised jutuajamised ja mõnusad kulalised. programme.title: Maahommik
programme.desc: "Maahommik" randab mooda Eestimaad ringi ja kohtub erinevate inimeste ja nende põnevate tegemistega. Teie ees rullub lahti maaelu varvipalett koos kõikide oma varjunditega. Loomad, taimed, talud, tood ja musttuhat muud lugu ootab teid just "Maahommiku" saates. Saatejuht on Kerli Dello. Vastutav toimetaja Maili Metssalu, režissoorid Mikk Mae ja Mati Kark, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Osoon
programme.desc: Tallinna Tehnikaulikooli teadlaste kutsel kais sel suvel Eestis tunnustatud Briti loodusfotograaf ja allveefilmija Jack Perks, kes on hindamatu spetsialist kalade filmimise alal. Kohtume Perksiga Pirita jõel, kus ta Eesti teadusruhma nõustab. Eesti on hiljuti saanud rikkamaks uhe orhideeliigi võrra. Meil on eriline võimalus naha seda salajases paigas kasvavat kapalist nimega sale tanukeel, mis on võetud range kaitse alla. Kaido Haageni luhilugu viib meid inimese poolt asustamata Kuningakulla, kus kaib siiski vilgas elu. Saate autorid on Kristo Elias ja Sander Loite, toimetaja Marit Valk, režissoor Keiti Valiste, produtsent Heiki Sepp.

programme.title: Elu lugu
programme.desc: Urmas Puhkan nimetab ennast ise garaažikunstnikuks, sest just siin koduõuel sunnib ta looming. Tervislikel põhjustel on keraamikust saanud maalija, kelle ellu on tulnud tugevalt varv ja eriti, kui garaaži uksed lahti lukata ja loodus ning inspiratsioon sisse lasta. Garaažis kais Reet Linna.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: María naudib kostuumipidu taiest hingest. Majas liiguvad jutud Manueli kaitumisest. Jimena teeb markiisile etteheiteid. Catalina tunnistab, et on armunud.

programme.title: Solsidan
programme.desc: Fredde hakkab muretsema oma vanuse parast ja kaib iluoperatsioonil. Alexil on dilemma: tutar Wilma ei taha mangida uue sõbra Milliega, aga Alex suhtleks hea meelega Millie isaga. Mickan saab rolli etenduses, kus Anna parajasti proove teeb.

programme.title: Eesti nuud siis Vabariik
programme.desc: Ats on jõudnud omadega harmooniasse. Vanad rivaalid teevad Kukekeses vaherahu ja otsustavad aastavahetuse veeta kellegi juures kulas sikku tehes. Tiina ja Paavo on kapis. President on Sirjele šokeeriv.

programme.title: Sisi
programme.desc: Printsess Sisi oli Euroopa esimene superstaar. Muretu teismelisena armus ta võimukasse ja ihaldusvaarsesse mehesse, kellel oli ka oma sunge ja ohtlik pool. Sisi peab langetama tõsise valiku ja võtab valjakutse vastu.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Scripps ja Greengrass korraldavad sõjavaelised matused. Jackie Bradley satub tundmatu helistaja ja fotokaamera ahistusobjektiks.

programme.title: Õnne 13
programme.desc: Koju saabub Rudolf, kes toob kaasa "rõõmu", aga ka laanelikku mõtlemist ja kapitalistlikku ellusuhtumist. Richard tuleb kohtust. Georg laheb Eveliniga lepitust otsima, kuid kodus on vaid Laine, kes vihastab, kui Georg ei nõustu talle alluma. Mare on pahas tujus kohtuprotsessi parast. Teet Kallase dokumentaaldraama. Idee autor Astrid Reinla.

programme.title: Queen of Fucking Everything
programme.desc: Linda ja Marke sõidavad Hispaaniasse ning Marke saab teada reisi tõelise eesmargi. Marke edutatakse Linda remondifirma Queen of Homes tegevdirektoriks. Linda kohtub Koistise naisena esinedes Hispaania ostjaga. Kodumaal puuab Koistinen kadunud kauba jalgi ajada ja salaparases tehingus selgust saada. Linda kasutab saadud raha firma stardikapitaliks ja paneb kokku eklektilise, kuid andeka remondibrigaadi.

programme.title: Elu lugu
programme.desc: Vabakutselisena on Egon Nuter manginud peaaegu kõigis Eesti teatrites ja teinud meeldejaavaima rolli parodeerides president Lennart Merit. Tema esimene koduteater oli Vanalinnastuudio, millest tana on alles vaid koht ja maja. Mida selle seinad raakida suudaks, tõlgib Egon Nuter Reet Linnale. Tana on Egon Nuteril 70. sunnipaev. Palju õnne!

programme.title: Eesti mang

programme.title: Mullist valja
programme.desc: Harkivis, mis kannatab venelaste terrori all, oli Putinil varem suur toetajaskond venekeelsete elanike hulgas. Enam mitte. Kas Anastassia ja Grigori mõistavad neid?

programme.title: OP lood
programme.desc: Margus Tabor ja Margit Kilumets tutvuvad parimusmuusik Lauri Õunapuu abil regilaulu põhjatu maailmaga.

programme.desc: "Pealtnagija tahed" toob vaatajani saatesarja viimaste aastate saravaimad persoonid. Tana on Voldemar Kuslapil 87. sunnipaev. Palju õnne!

programme.title: Eesti nuud siis Vabariik
programme.desc: Marjule pakutakse uut ja tulusat toootsa, mistõttu ta peab hakkama inimestelt nende suurusi kusima. Tiinal on suur mure televisiooni puudumise parast. Paavo paneb kogu uhiskoogi paukuma. Rein teeb lõpuks ometi tehingu.

programme.title: Matsalu loodusfilmide festival. 20 aastat elumuutvaid filme
programme.desc: Juba 20 aastat pannakse sookurgede sugisrande ajal Matsalus kaima ka filmiprojektorid. 2003. aastal asutatud filmifestival on publikut puudutanud, raputanud ja pannud mõtlema. See on muutunud ka oluliseks filmitegijate kooskaimise paigaks ja noorte innustajaks. Ümmarguse tahtpaeva eel valminud erisaates võetakse kokku festivali ajaloo eredamad hetked. Toimetaja Anne-Mari Muller, režissoor Alis Maesalu, produtsent Age Kraus.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Greengrass ja David lahevad Edith Bentoni puudliga Ashfordly koertenaitusele. Kirikust varastatakse hinnalised kuunlajalad ja reverendi tutar armastab meest, keda ta ema silmaotsaski ei salli.

programme.title: Õnne 13
programme.desc: On kevadpuhad. Annemai otsustab talus piduliku soomaaja korraldada. Johannesel ja Almal on pulmaaastapaev. Jaanus ja Jane saavad enne Jaanuse sõjavakkeminekut kokku kohvikus. Allanil on tõsine jutuajamine Jaanusega. Laine korraldab oma noorte elu, mis pole aga viimastele eriti meeltmooda ja nad otsustavad osta korteri Õnne 13 majja. Teet Kallase dokumentaaldraama. Idee autor Astrid Reinla.

programme.title: Solsidan
programme.desc: Fredde ja Mickan korraldavad oma poja Viktori lõpetamise puhul vastuvõtu. Alex on ostnud kingituse, millega soovivad jarsku uhineda Ove ja Anette ning teisedki. Mickan muretseb kõne parast, mida ta Victorile pidada plaanib.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Jimena saab narvivapustuse. Pelayo pakub, et tasub võlad oma taskust. Feliciano pakub Salvadorile abi. Jana tunnistab Manuelile oma tundeid.

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lõbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Tahelepanu! Tegemist on teadusega
programme.desc: Eesti teadlased teevad iga paev avastusi, mis aitavad muuta meie tulevikku targemaks, turvalisemaks ja põnevamaks. Klipisari viib vaataja laboritesse ja katsevaljakutele, kus sunnivad ullatuslikud ideed ja avanevad teadusmaailma salaparased telgitagused. Režissoor Maarika Lauri, toimetaja Marit Ummelas.

programme.title: Pealtnagija
programme.desc: "Pealtnagija" on Eesti pikima ajalooga ja teletabelite tipus olev uuriv ajakirjandussaade, mis toob vaatajateni põnevad ja paljastavad lood meie uhiskonna telgitagustest. Lisaks teravatele uurimustele vahendab saade ka haaravaid persoone ja meeldejaavaid reportaaže sundmustest, mille pealtnagijaks tavaline inimene naljalt ei satu. Saatejuhid Mihkel Karmas, Kristjan Pihl, Merilin Parli, Taavi Eilat ja Margit Kilumets. Režissoorid Raivo Maripuu ja Vladlen Pobjaržin, produtsent Piret Priisaar.

programme.title: Kultuuri kodu
programme.desc: Kultuuri kodu on koht kõigile Eesti kirjanikele, muusikutele, kunstnikele, arhitektidele, disaineritele, teatri- ja filmiinimestele. See on ruumikas pesapaik, kuhu mahuvad kõik kenasti ara ja head kultuuri pole ju kunagi liiga palju. Eesti Kultuurkapitali sajanda juubeli puhul koputame kultuuri kodu uksele ja vaatame, kes neist meie aega ja ruumi kujundavatest loojatest parajasti kodus juhtub olema. Luhiportreede sarja režissoor on Erle Veber, tekste kirjutab Urmas Vadi ja loeb Marika Vaarik, arhiivis toimetab Ruth Alakula, kaamerat juhib Manuel Magi ning mikrofoni hoiab Mart Kessel-Otsa.

programme.desc: Spordiuudised

programme.title: Esimene stuudio
programme.desc: Saatesari avab erinevaid paevakajalisi teemasid, mis sunnivad meie igapaeva-elust, alates poliitikast ja majandusest, lõpetades sotsiaalia ning kultuuriga. Saatejuhid Andres Kuusk, Johannes Tralla, Mirko Ojakivi. Režissoor Maarika Lauri, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Pool sajandit varske Apelsin
programme.desc: Ansambel Apelsin on veerenud pool sajandit koos erinevate solistide, laulukirjutajate ja isegi riigikordadega. Mismoodi see kirju seltskond Eesti muusikat igaveseks muutis, lahkavad Ivo Linna, Harry Kõrvits, Olavi Pihlamagi, Ants Nuut, Helin-Mari Arder, Mart ja Martin Aare ning teised. Toimetajad Kai Vaartnõu ja Karmel Killandi, režissoor Hanna Šein-Meier, operaator Rasmus Kosseson, produtsent Kadi Katarina Priske. 27. septembril on Ants Nuudil 75. sunnipaev. Palju õnne!

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lõbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Greengrass ja David lahevad Edith Bentoni puudliga Ashfordly koertenaitusele. Kirikust varastatakse hinnalised kuunlajalad ja reverendi tutar armastab meest, keda ta ema silmaotsaski ei salli.

programme.title: Eesti nuud siis Vabariik
programme.desc: Marjule pakutakse uut ja tulusat toootsa, mistõttu ta peab hakkama inimestelt nende suurusi kusima. Tiinal on suur mure televisiooni puudumise parast. Paavo paneb kogu uhiskoogi paukuma. Rein teeb lõpuks ometi tehingu.

programme.title: Tuleb tuttav ette
programme.desc: Kas maletate aegu, mil pea kogu Eesti rahvas istus televiisorite ees ja vaatas nagu uks mees Öo-televisiooni. See oli aeg, kus meie uksmeel oli ullatavalt suur. Saates meenutame seda erakordset saatesarja ja sellega seonduvat. Saatejuht ja autor Reet Linna, režissoor Maire Radsin.

programme.title: ERR.ee uudised
programme.desc: ERR.ee uudised

programme.title: 24 in 24: Last Chef Standing
programme.desc: During hours three through six, the chefs must adapt to constant twists and turns. Michael Symon and Esther Choi have two chefs face elimination immediately, and the competitors navigate curveballs from Stephanie Izard in order to make it to hour seven.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri hunts desert and island flavour. He enjoys nostalgic breakfast tarts at a cafe in California and fish and chips at a gluten-free spot in Hawaii.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: In Norfolk, VA, Guy finds a two-for-one spot stacking sandwiches by day and firing up ramen and sticky wings at night. Then, he visits a German-Swiss joint in Maui, HI, that serves rouladen and old-fashioned apple strudel.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Three champions are on a mission to beat judge Marc Murphy. The chefs get escargot in the first basket, and a spicy surprise awaits them in the entree basket.

programme.title: Supermarket Stakeout
programme.desc: Four fierce chefs forage the parking lot to create flatbreads. Then, the competitors hit the fryers to make something golden brown and delicious.

programme.title: Magnolia Table with Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Inspired by her honeymoon in Maine, Joanna makes lobster rolls, hush puppies, wedge salad with blue cheese dressing and cherries jubilee.

programme.title: Magnolia Table with Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Joanna makes an Italian meal including pink baked ziti, roasted garlic parmesan toast and antipasto salad with sun-dried tomato vinaigrette.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Actress Lela Loren and Michael Symon recruit two international chefs to take down Bobby. In the second round, Bobby must make a dish hes never heard of.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Comedian Jaboukie Young-White and chef Anne Burrell are determined to take down Bobby. They recruit Italian expert chefs Nicole Karr and David Benstock.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: John Henson asks the bakers to create lighting in a bottle with desserts based on classic cocktails. Then, the bakers face their fears by frightening judges Stephanie Boswell, Zac Young and Carla Hall with entremets that represent their worst nightmares.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Four chefs go head-to-head in a three-round competition, turning mystery ingredients into extraordinary meals hoping to impress a panel of judges.

programme.title: Magnolia Table with Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Jo makes BBQ pulled pork sandwiches, corn on the cob with charred jalapeño garlic butter and peach cobbler with actress Angela Kinsey.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Things are coming to a head on Symons Dinners as Michael Symon gets corny with some summery dishes. Kicking it off with Fried Clams and a homemade tartar sauce as the main dish.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh makes some easy Midwest staples. She prepares carrot cake baked oatmeal, pea and bacon salad with French dressing, and rocky road fudge for dessert.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly starts the Yeh-Hagen Family Games with a delicious bang! She makes tacos, Mexican street corn-loaded tots, and coconut mango pops for dessert.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives: Triple D Nation
programme.desc: Guy Fieri grabs seconds of smoked bacon meatloaf in Atlanta, competition-style barbecue in Scottsdale, AZ, and a next-level burger in Fort Worth, TX.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives: Triple D Nation
programme.desc: Guy Fieri eats his way through out-of-bounds risotto in Atlanta, real deal relleno in Anthem, AZ, and succulent snapper in Arlington, TX.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Michael Symon is ready to celebrate Dad with a twist on Texas chilli, sweet and savoury cornbread, and some chocolatey, nutty dessert bars.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Michael Symon enjoys a golden summer with his California-inspired feast of smoked tri-tip, grilled avocado salad and strawberry chiffon cake.

programme.title: Cake Masters
programme.desc: Duff Goldman and his team create a four-wheeled showstopper of a monster truck cake, then take centre stage with a working guitar thats also made of cake!

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: John Henson asks the bakers to create lighting in a bottle with desserts based on classic cocktails. Then, the bakers face their fears by frightening judges Stephanie Boswell, Zac Young and Carla Hall with entremets that represent their worst nightmares.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Giada De Laurentiis and Marcus Samuelsson hope two global chefs can defeat Bobby. In round one, the chefs are given 20 minutes to make a dish with rambutan.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Valerie Bertinelli and Amanda Freitag call on two New York chefs to take down Bobby. First, the chefs are challenged to cook with a strong-smelling cheese.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri takes a culinary trip with adventurous flavour. A funky LA spot fills bowls with eclectic eats while a Norfolk, VA, market offers Mexican specialties.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri grabs some crazy grub! In Hawaii he finds a funky joint serving beer can chicken. Plus, he stops at a downtown barbecue spot in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Previous winners return to take on judge Maneet Chauhan. Cereal and odd meatballs make for a tough round one, and an edible centrepiece is in the next basket.

programme.title: Supermarket Stakeout
programme.desc: Alex Guarnaschelli asks four chefs to scour the parking lot to produce protein style plates. Then, the competitors must create family style platters.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives: Triple D Nation
programme.desc: Guy Fieri digs in diner style with mighty mac n cheese in Atlanta, brisket hash in San Antonio and a supreme breakfast burrito in Scottsdale, AZ.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives: Triple D Nation
programme.desc: Guy Fieri heads back for a taste of Thailand in Boulder, CO, Pakistani favourites in Tempe, AZ, and Moroccan specialties in San Antonio.

programme.title: Superchef Grudge Match
programme.desc: Adam Sobel seeks to publicly humiliate Matt Jennings, and Marjorie Meek-Bradley calls out elite competitor Mei Lin.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: For their final night, John Henson asks the bakers to create sweet and savory grazing boards in honor of a dearly departed couple. Then, Carla Hall, Stephanie Boswell and Zac Young judge black wedding cakes to determine the Halloween Baking Champion.

programme.title: Alex Vs. America
programme.desc: Three chefs from Arizona, New Mexico and Texas show Alex Guarnaschelli the best of the Southwest in two spicy rounds of competition.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: The chefs struggle with a "secret" meat in the entree basket. Then, they must use their creativity to mix avocado and superfood desserts successfully.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives: Triple D Nation
